sentences.en: Among the Santa Isabella's crew, landing preparations intensified.
sentences.cn: 桑塔·伊莎贝拉号的船员们加紧了靠岸的准备工作.

sentences.en: Bah! There is no Santa Claus.
sentences.cn: 哼, 那里有什么圣诞老人!

sentences.en: Christopher Columbus set sail for the New World in the Santa Maria.
sentences.cn: 克里斯托弗·哥伦布从圣玛丽亚启航前往新大陆。

sentences.en: Continue down the same road for another 2 kilometres until you reach the church of Santa Maria.
sentences.cn: 沿同一条路再往前走两公里，直至到达圣马丽亚教堂。

sentences.en: Drive me back to Santa Clara.
From then on，red stockings were hung by the chimney in hopes Santa would fill them with gifts.
sentences.cn: 从那以后，红色长筒袜就常被挂在烟囱上，希望圣诞老人能够在里面塞满礼物。

sentences.en: He believes Santa Claus comes in through the chimney.
sentences.cn: 他相信圣诞老人从烟囱进来.

sentences.en: I awaited Christmas Eve, and the always exciting advent of fat Santa.
sentences.cn: 我等待着圣诞前夜，以及圣诞胖爷爷那总是令人兴奋的到来。

sentences.en: I wanted to believe like I believed last year — that Santa was a big fat elf in a red suit.
sentences.cn: 我想要像去年一样深信不疑——圣诞老人是个穿红衣的胖精灵.

sentences.en: It'seems like one thing Santa likes to do is eat.
sentences.cn: 圣诞老人喜欢做的一件事似乎就是吃.

sentences.en: Once they settled in, my father looked back over his shoulder and asked the children if Santa had found them yet.
sentences.cn: 一旦他们在汽车里安顿了下来，爸爸转过头来问那几个孩子，圣诞老人是否找到了他们。

sentences.en: Santa Clara ? OK. That's about 20 miles away.
sentences.cn: 圣塔克莱拉? 好的, 大约是20英里远.

sentences.en: Santa Claus is the personification of Christmas.
sentences.cn: 圣诞老人是圣诞节的象征.

sentences.en: Santa Maria di Castellabate is barely mentioned in guidebooks; therein lies its charm.
sentences.cn: 卡斯特拉巴泰的圣玛丽亚在旅行指南里鲜有被提及，而它的魅力正在于此。

sentences.en: The little girl ran up to Santa and hugged him tightly.
sentences.cn: 小姑娘跑到圣诞老人跟前,紧紧地搂抱他.

sentences.en: The railroad finally reached Santa Barbara in 1877.
sentences.cn: 铁路终于在1877年修到了圣巴巴拉。

sentences.en: Try something new whether it’s a gift or an experience so you can keep the years from becoming a blur. This will always be the year that I first dressed up like Santa.
sentences.cn: 不管是一件礼物还是一次体验，尝试新的东西可以让那些美好的日子不至于那么快消散，我第一次当圣诞老人的这一年亦将成为记忆中的永恒。

sentences.en: Zeus is made by Computer Motion of Santa Barbara, California, which also sells Aesop.
sentences.cn: 宙斯是由加州圣-巴巴拉计算机运动研究所制造的.这家公司也出售机器人伊索.

phrases.tran_cn: 圣巴巴拉市（美国加利福尼亚州西南海岸城市）
圣克拉拉（美国加利福尼亚州西部城市）；圣克拉拉（古巴中部城市）
圣克鲁兹（美国加利福尼亚州西部城市）
圣马丽亚（美国加利福尼亚州西部城市，巴西南部城市）；圣马利亚活火山（位于危地马拉西部）；圣马利亚号（哥伦布第一次远航发现美洲所乘之船）
